component.name: part0
component.description: Virtex-UltraScale+ FPGA part on the board

interface.name: qdrii_sdram_c0
interface.description: QDR II C0 board interface, it can use QDRIIP IP for connection.

interface.name: qdrii_sdram_c1
interface.description: QDR II C1 board interface, it can use QDRIIP IP for connection.

interface.name: qdrii_sdram_c2
interface.description: QDR II C2 board interface, it can use QDRIIP IP for connection.

component.name: default_400mhz_clk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 400 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: default_300mhz_clk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 300 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: default_100mhz_clk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 100 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: default_200mhz_refclk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 200 MHz oscillator used as reference differential clock on the board

component.name: default_200mhz_memclk0
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 200 MHz oscillator used as qdriip reference clock on the board

component.name: default_200mhz_memclk1
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 200 MHz oscillator used as qdriip reference clock on the board

component.name: default_200mhz_memclk2
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 200 MHz oscillator used as qdriip reference clock on the board

component.name: pcie_refclk
component.description: Clock input from PCI Express edge connector
